alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 02 at 8:25AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST/9 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of north central Arizona, including the following areas, Grand Canyon Country, Kaibab Plateau and Marble and Glen Canyons. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST/9 PM MDT/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding will be possible in creeks, normally dry washes, and swimming holes. Low-water crossings could also become flooded, which would create deadly travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A trough of low pressure moving through northwestern Arizona today will trigger thunderstorms that could produce flash flooding over the watch area. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons
